      • compareAnswer

        public boolean compareAnswer(int ans)
        从接口复制的说明: Question
        This method compares the student's answer to the standard answer.
        指定者:
        compareAnswer 在接口中 Question
        参数:
        ans - The student's answer
        返回:
        True for the correct answer; false for incorrect answers.
        另请参阅:
        Question.getQuestion(), Question.getChoices()
